channel.title: Words on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Words on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: the mouth trap
item.description: as i read through proverbs, there is a lot of attention paid to the mess our mouths can get us in. gossip, complaining, breaking confidences, & just being stupid, it’s all mentioned on the “avoid” list. but, gosh, it’s so hard to break those habits! i’ve been trying to cut down on my negative word quota, and i’m finding it would be a whole lot easier if it weren’t for having other people around.
